settings.content: Use this feature to show custom badge text on the top of the product cards (New, Trending, Hot, etc)

settings.label: Metafield namespace/key
settings.info: [Create the above metafield](https://shopify.com/admin/metafields/product/create) with the type of "Single Line Text" and then add a short text. E.g: "New". If you like to have a different color for each custom badge use this format "New | #121212"

settings.label: Description
settings.default: 10% OFF for your first order. Use code NEW10

settings.label: Show confetti animation
settings.info: It will show after a goal is completed

settings.label: Goal value
settings.info: Comma-separated list of currencies with their respective goal value. E.g USD:100, EUR:90. Leave empty to disable

settings.label: Goal value
settings.info: Comma-separated list of currencies with their respective goal value. E.g USD:100, EUR:90. Leave empty to disable

settings.label: Goal value
settings.info: Comma-separated list of currencies with their respective goal value. E.g USD:100, EUR:90. Leave empty to disable

settings.label: Description
settings.default: Wrap as gifts the items in the cart for only only [price]
